des: "This is a quick and easy milkshake I created a few years back while I was bartending to serve the children that ate in the restaurant - their parents loved it just as much! This is a very versatile recipe. You can change the flavor of ice cream to create any flavor milkshake you'd like."
ins: In a blender, combine ice cream, half-and-half and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass and serve.
